translations: n.垃圾，废弃物；毫无价值的东西，劣质产品；废话，瞎说
v.<英，非正式>严厉批评，把……说得一无是处
adj.<英，非正式>很差劲的，无用的

sentences.sentence: The tornado rubbished the whole village.
sentences.translation: 龙卷风毁掉了整个村庄。

sentences.sentence: The film was rubbished by the critics.
sentences.translation: 影评家把这部影片贬得一无是处。

sentences.sentence: He rubbished most of the novels written by contemporary writers.
sentences.translation: 他把大多数当代作家写的小说贬得一无是处。
